leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-单细胞与空间组学生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→整合→聚类/轨迹→注释→可视化→复现
leaf_cluster.tool_form: R/Python生态 + 交互可视化 + pipelines

queries: [WEB] reproducible single cell research template github

tools.name: Tibanna
tools.one_line_profile: AWS cloud execution engine for genomic pipelines (CWL/WDL/Snakemake)
tools.detailed_description: Tibanna is a software tool that helps run genomic pipelines on Amazon Web Services (AWS). It supports standard workflow languages like CWL and WDL, as well as Snakemake, and is used by the 4DN DCIC for data processing.

tools.name: ATRACKCS
tools.one_line_profile: Automated detection and tracking of mesoscale convective systems
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for the automated detection and tracking of mesoscale convective systems in meteorological data, facilitating climate and weather research.

tools.name: TallyNN
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell analysis workflows for scCOLOR-seq data
tools.detailed_description: Provides single-cell analysis workflows specifically designed for double phosphoramidite barcode and UMI correction in scCOLOR-seq experiments.

tools.name: scpca-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow workflow for Single-cell Pediatric Cancer Atlas data
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow workflow developed for processing data for the Single-cell Pediatric Cancer Atlas Portal, ensuring standardized analysis of pediatric cancer single-cell data.

tools.name: SingleCellExperiment (Python)
tools.one_line_profile: Python container class for single-cell experiments
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the SingleCellExperiment container class, providing a standardized data structure for storing and manipulating single-cell experiment data, mirroring the Bioconductor R class.

tools.name: stLearn
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning pipeline for spatial transcriptomics analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive machine learning pipeline for analyzing spatial transcriptomics data, integrating gene expression, tissue morphology, and spatial location to infer biological insights.

tools.name: IMCDataAnalysis
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for multiplexed imaging data analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R-based workflow designed for the analysis of multiplexed imaging data, such as Imaging Mass Cytometry (IMC), facilitating processing and visualization of high-dimensional image data.

tools.name: CalliNGS-NF
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for GATK RNA-Seq Variant Calling
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline implementing the GATK Best Practices for RNA-Seq variant calling, enabling reproducible and scalable detection of genetic variants from RNA sequencing data.

tools.name: fold_tree
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for creating phylogenetic trees
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake pipeline designed to automate the creation of phylogenetic trees from sets of sequences, streamlining the process of evolutionary analysis.

tools.name: VIRify
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for detection of phages and eukaryotic viruses
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for the detection and classification of bacteriophages and eukaryotic viruses from metagenomic and metatranscriptomic assembly data.

tools.name: REAT
tools.one_line_profile: Robust Eukaryotic Annotation Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed for the robust annotation of eukaryotic genomes, facilitating the identification and functional characterization of genomic elements.

tools.name: caper
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for Cromwell/WDL workflow execution
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper and CLI for the Cromwell workflow engine, designed to simplify the execution of WDL workflows on various infrastructure backends, widely used by the ENCODE project.

tools.name: croo
tools.one_line_profile: Cromwell output organizer
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool to organize and structure the output files generated by Cromwell workflow executions, making it easier to manage and interpret results from complex pipelines.

tools.name: scAmpi
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for single-cell RNA-seq analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive workflow for single-cell RNA-seq data analysis, providing end-to-end processing capabilities from raw data to biological insights.

tools.name: MAG_Snakemake_wf
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for recovery of prokaryotic genomes
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed for the recovery of prokaryotic genomes (Metagenome-Assembled Genomes, MAGs) from shotgun metagenomic sequencing data.

tools.name: AsaruSim
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation workflow for 10X single cell Nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for simulating 10X Genomics single-cell RNA-seq data sequenced with Nanopore technology, useful for benchmarking and method development.

tools.name: Eoulsan
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline and framework for NGS analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based framework and pipeline for the analysis of Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data, including RNA-seq and scRNA-seq, supporting distributed computing.

tools.name: sv-callers
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for structural variant detection
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based workflow that integrates multiple tools for detecting structural variants in genomic data, ensuring reproducible and comprehensive variant calling.

tools.name: dropSeqPipe
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for Drop-Seq scRNA-seq pre-processing
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow specifically designed for the pre-processing of Drop-Seq single-cell RNA-seq data, handling alignment, quantification, and quality control.

tools.name: multifish
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis pipeline for EASI-FISH spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A computational pipeline for processing and analyzing EASI-FISH data, enabling high-resolution spatial transcriptomics studies.

tools.name: Kitware Cumulus
tools.one_line_profile: Cloud cluster management platform for scientific computing
tools.detailed_description: A platform and REST API developed by Kitware for creating and managing cloud clusters, facilitating high-performance computing (HPC) and scientific workflows in the cloud.

tools.name: pytest-workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Test framework for bioinformatics workflows
tools.detailed_description: A Pytest plugin designed for testing bioinformatics workflows and pipelines (e.g., Snakemake, Nextflow) using YAML configuration files, ensuring reproducibility and correctness.

tools.name: VistoSeg
tools.one_line_profile: Image processing pipeline for spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based image processing pipeline designed for segmentation and analysis of high-resolution images in spatial transcriptomics projects.

tools.name: scPipe
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for single-cell RNA-seq data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Bioconductor package that provides a pipeline for processing single-cell RNA-seq data, including demultiplexing, alignment, and quality control.

tools.name: HPCell
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel HPC workflows for single-cell analysis
tools.detailed_description: A tool to convert single-cell and spatial analysis scripts into parallel workflows compatible with HPC and cloud environments, streamlining large-scale data processing.

tools.name: py-lmd
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for processing Leica LMD6 & LMD7 microscope cutting data and segmentation masks
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to read, create, and write cutting data for Leica LMD6 and LMD7 laser microdissection microscopes. It facilitates reproducible workflows for calibrating, importing SVG files, and converting single-cell segmentation masks into machine-readable cutting instructions.

tools.name: ReapTEC
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for simultaneous profiling of gene expression and enhancer activity in 5' scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed to simultaneously profile gene expression and enhancer activity using 5' single-cell RNA sequencing datasets. It enables the analysis of cis-regulatory elements alongside transcriptional output in single cells.

tools.name: SCREW
tools.one_line_profile: Reproducible workflow for Single-Cell Epigenomics analysis using CWL
tools.detailed_description: SCREW (Single-Cell Reproducible Epigenomics Workflow) is a Common Workflow Language (CWL) based pipeline for analyzing single-cell epigenomic data. It ensures reproducibility and scalability for processing complex single-cell chromatin data.

tools.name: SCassist
tools.one_line_profile: AI-based workflow assistant for optimizing single-cell analysis parameters
tools.detailed_description: An AI-driven workflow assistant designed to help researchers optimize parameters and processing steps for single-cell data analysis, aiming to improve the robustness and reproducibility of scRNA-seq workflows.

tools.name: scRNAseq_workflow_benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark framework for scRNA-seq analysis workflows using R/Bioconductor
tools.detailed_description: A workflow designed to benchmark various single-cell RNA-seq analysis pipelines and methods using R and Bioconductor. It facilitates the evaluation of different analytical strategies for reproducibility and performance.

tools.name: pgsc_calc
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for calculating polygenic scores (PGS) from genomic data
tools.detailed_description: A robust Nextflow pipeline developed by the PGS Catalog for calculating polygenic scores. It automates the matching of variants, handling of different genome builds, and scoring of individuals based on PGS Catalog definitions.

tools.name: HiFi-16S-workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for analyzing PacBio HiFi full-length 16S rRNA data
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline built with Nextflow for processing and analyzing PacBio HiFi full-length 16S rRNA sequencing data. It handles quality control, classification, and diversity analysis for metagenomic studies.

tools.name: CATD_snakemake
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for benchmarking cell-type deconvolution methods
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed to benchmark various cell-type deconvolution methods. It uses single-cell RNA-seq datasets to simulate bulk data or as references to deconvolve real bulk RNA-seq data, facilitating method evaluation.

tools.name: PyPSA-Eur
tools.one_line_profile: Open optimization model of the European energy system
tools.detailed_description: PyPSA-Eur is a sector-coupled open optimization model of the European energy system. It covers electricity, transport, and heat sectors, allowing researchers to model and optimize energy transition scenarios.

tools.name: VesselExpress
tools.one_line_profile: Automated analysis of blood vasculature in 3D light-sheet image volumes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the automated analysis of blood vasculature structures in 3D light-sheet microscopy image volumes. It provides algorithms for segmentation, skeletonization, and quantification of vascular networks.

tools.name: reticulatus
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for assembling and polishing long genomes from nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based bioinformatics pipeline for the assembly and polishing of genomes using long reads from Oxford Nanopore Technologies. It integrates assembly, polishing, and quality assessment steps.

tools.name: spatialone-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for spatial transcriptomics analysis
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline developed by Sanofi for the analysis of spatial transcriptomics data. It likely includes steps for data processing, quality control, and spatial feature extraction.

tools.name: ScaleRna
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow workflow for ScaleBio single-cell RNA sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow workflow specifically designed for processing single-cell RNA sequencing data generated using ScaleBio's technology. It handles demultiplexing, alignment, and quantification.

tools.name: Alexandria
tools.one_line_profile: Platform and workflows for single-cell data repository and analysis
tools.detailed_description: The Alexandria project provides a single-cell data repository along with associated workflows, notebooks, and scripts to facilitate accessible single-cell data analysis and sharing.

tools.name: scRNAseq_pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: Pipelines for processing scRNA-seq data from Sun Lab
tools.detailed_description: A collection of pipelines and scripts for processing single-cell RNA sequencing data, maintained by the Sun Lab. It provides tools for standard scRNA-seq analysis tasks.

tools.name: ACES
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow to query small sequences in large sets of genomes
tools.detailed_description: ACES (Analysis of Conserved Elements and Sequences) is a workflow designed to query small sequences across a large set of genomes. It outputs BLAST results, multiple sequence alignments, graphical fragment assemblies, and phylogenetic trees.

tools.name: STQ
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial Transcriptomics Quantification pipeline for Visium and H&E images
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for Spatial Transcriptomics Quantification (STQ) designed for 10x Visium and H&E-stained whole slide images. It processes imaging and sequencing data to quantify gene expression in a spatial context.

tools.name: nf-tenx
tools.one_line_profile: Containerized Nextflow pipelines for 10x Genomics data processing
tools.detailed_description: A collection of containerized Nextflow pipelines for processing 10x Genomics single-cell data. It integrates various steps for scRNA-seq analysis into a unified, reproducible workflow.

tools.name: SciCumulus
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific workflow engine for cloud environments
tools.detailed_description: SciCumulus is a workflow engine designed to execute scientific workflows in cloud computing environments. It manages the parallel execution and distribution of tasks for data-intensive scientific applications.

tools.name: snk
tools.one_line_profile: CLI generation tool for Snakemake workflows
tools.detailed_description: A tool that automatically generates Command Line Interfaces (CLIs) for Snakemake workflows, making them easier to distribute and use as standalone applications.

tools.name: SCENICprotocol
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable workflow for single-cell gene regulatory network analysis (SCENIC)
tools.detailed_description: A scalable implementation of the SCENIC (Single-Cell rEgulatory Network Inference and Clustering) workflow. It enables the reconstruction of gene regulatory networks and the identification of stable cell states from single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: SpatialNF
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipelines for spatial transcriptomics analysis
tools.detailed_description: A set of Nextflow pipelines for processing and analyzing spatial transcriptomics data, developed by the Aerts Lab. It ensures reproducible analysis of spatial gene expression patterns.

tools.name: BindFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for FEP and MM/PBSA calculations with GROMACS
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based automated workflow for performing Free Energy Perturbation (FEP) and MM/PBSA (Molecular Mechanics Poisson-Boltzmann Surface Area) calculations using GROMACS. It streamlines molecular dynamics simulations for binding energy estimation.

tools.name: cromwell-client
tools.one_line_profile: Scala client for the Cromwell workflow engine
tools.detailed_description: A Scala library providing a client interface to interact with the Cromwell scientific workflow engine, facilitating workflow submission, status monitoring, and management.

tools.name: nf-test
tools.one_line_profile: Test framework for Nextflow pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A simple and powerful testing framework designed specifically for Nextflow pipelines to ensure reproducibility and correctness of scientific workflows.

tools.name: FlowCraft
tools.one_line_profile: Component-based pipeline composer for omics analysis
tools.detailed_description: A tool for building and composing Nextflow pipelines for omics data analysis using a component-based architecture, allowing flexible assembly of bioinformatics tools.

tools.name: Bactopia
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible pipeline for bacterial genome analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive and flexible Nextflow pipeline for the complete analysis of bacterial genomes, including assembly, annotation, and variant calling.

tools.name: Snaketool
tools.one_line_profile: Scaffolding tool for Snakemake-based bioinformatics tools
tools.detailed_description: A Cookiecutter profile and utility to streamline the creation of standardized, installable Snakemake-based bioinformatics workflows.

tools.name: kraken2_classification
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for metagenomic classification
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed for performing metagenomic classification using Kraken2, facilitating taxonomic assignment of sequencing reads.

tools.name: ABFE_workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for Absolute Binding Free Energy calculations
tools.detailed_description: A scalable Snakemake workflow for performing Absolute Binding Free Energy (ABFE) calculations, suitable for high-throughput molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: Master of Pores
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for direct RNA Nanopore analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for the analysis of direct RNA sequencing data from Oxford Nanopore Technologies, covering preprocessing to modification detection.

tools.name: scDAPP
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-end scRNA-seq analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: An R-based pipeline for end-to-end analysis of single-cell RNA-seq data, focusing on cross-group comparisons and visualization.

tools.name: scdrake
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for scRNA-seq and spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A scalable pipeline for droplet-based single-cell RNA-seq and spatial transcriptomics analysis, implemented using the `drake` workflow manager in R.

tools.name: cromshell
tools.one_line_profile: CLI for interacting with Cromwell servers
tools.detailed_description: A command-line interface tool for submitting workflows, monitoring status, and retrieving metadata from a Cromwell server.

tools.name: Cromwell
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific workflow engine for WDL
tools.detailed_description: A workflow management system designed to simplify the definition and execution of scientific workflows (WDL) at scale on various platforms.

tools.name: cromwell-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Python clients and scripts for Cromwell
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python tools and libraries for interacting with the Cromwell workflow engine, including API clients and utility scripts.

tools.name: wdl-ide
tools.one_line_profile: IDE support for Workflow Description Language
tools.detailed_description: Tools and extensions to provide IDE features like syntax highlighting and validation for developing WDL scientific workflows.

tools.name: V-pipe
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for viral genome analysis
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for the analysis of next-generation sequencing data derived from viral pathogens, supporting variant calling and haplotype reconstruction.

tools.name: CompareM2
tools.one_line_profile: Microbial genomes-to-report pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for comparative genomics of microbial organisms, generating comprehensive reports from genomic data.

tools.name: scFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit and workflow for scRNA-seq analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive R package and workflow for the analysis of single-cell and single-nuclei RNA-sequencing data, covering QC to differential expression.

tools.name: ncov2019-artic-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for SARS-CoV-2 ARTIC data
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for processing SARS-CoV-2 sequencing data using the ARTIC network protocols and tools.

tools.name: pyflow-ATACseq
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for ATAC-seq
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based pipeline for processing ATAC-seq data, including alignment, peak calling, and quality control.

tools.name: pyflow-ChIPseq
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for ChIP-seq
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake pipeline for the analysis of ChIP-seq data, handling steps from raw reads to peak calling and visualization.

tools.name: ARMOR
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for RNA-seq analysis
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight and portable Snakemake workflow for preprocessing, quality control, and statistical analysis of bulk RNA-seq data.

tools.name: dbMAP
tools.one_line_profile: Dimensionality reduction tool for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for fast and accurate dimensionality reduction using diffusion harmonics, suitable for large-scale single-cell data visualization and clustering.

tools.name: single-cell-nanopore
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for Nanopore scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for processing and analyzing single-cell RNA sequencing data generated using Oxford Nanopore Technologies.

tools.name: Dockstore
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for sharing scientific tools and workflows
tools.detailed_description: The source code for the Dockstore platform, which serves as a registry for sharing Docker-based scientific tools and workflows (CWL, WDL, Nextflow).

tools.name: scxa-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Single Cell Expression Atlas workflows
tools.detailed_description: A collection of workflow logic and pipelines used by the EBI Single Cell Expression Atlas for processing single-cell data.

tools.name: MrBiomics
tools.one_line_profile: Composable modules and recipes for automating multi-omics bioinformatics analyses
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics workflow framework that provides composable modules and recipes to automate multi-omics analyses, facilitating reproducibility and scalability.

tools.name: atacseq_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for ATAC-seq data processing and quantification
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module designed for the processing, quantification, and annotation of ATAC-seq data.

tools.name: dea_limma
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for differential expression analysis using limma
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module for performing and visualizing differential analyses of NGS data, powered by the R package limma.

tools.name: dea_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for single-cell differential expression analysis using Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module for performing differential expression analyses (DEA) on multimodal sc/snRNA-seq data using Seurat.

tools.name: enrichment_analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for genomic region and gene set enrichment analyses
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module for performing genomic region set and gene set enrichment analyses using tools like LOLA, GREAT, and GSEApy.

tools.name: genome_tracks
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for visualization of genome browser tracks
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module for generating and visualizing genome browser tracks from aligned BAM files using pyGenomeTracks and IGV-reports.

tools.name: mixscape_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for CRISPR screen perturbation analysis using Mixscape
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module for performing perturbation analyses of pooled CRISPR screens with sc/snRNA-seq read-out using Seurat's Mixscape method.

tools.name: scrnaseq_processing_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for processing sc/snRNA-seq data with Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module for processing and visualizing multimodal sc/snRNA-seq data generated with 10X Genomics Kits or in MTX format.

tools.name: unsupervised_analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for dimensionality reduction and cluster analysis
tools.detailed_description: A general purpose Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module to perform unsupervised analyses including dimensionality reduction and cluster analysis for high-dimensional data.

tools.name: bacannot
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive pipeline for prokaryotic genome annotation
tools.detailed_description: A generic but comprehensive Nextflow pipeline for prokaryotic genome annotation and interrogation, featuring interactive reports and a shiny app.

tools.name: metaGEM
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for generating genome-scale metabolic models from metagenomic data
tools.detailed_description: An easy-to-use workflow for generating context-specific genome-scale metabolic models and predicting metabolic interactions within microbial communities directly from metagenomic data.

tools.name: mosaicatcher-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for SV calling from single-cell Strand-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An integrated workflow for structural variant (SV) calling from single-cell Strand-seq data.

tools.name: hybracter
tools.one_line_profile: Automated long-read first bacterial genome assembly tool
tools.detailed_description: An automated long-read first bacterial genome assembly tool implemented in Snakemake using Snaketool.

tools.name: nanopype
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipelines for nanopore sequencing data processing
tools.detailed_description: Snakemake pipelines for nanopore sequencing data archiving and processing.

tools.name: snpArcher
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for highly parallel variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for highly parallel variant calling designed for ease-of-use in non-model organisms.

tools.name: rnaflow
tools.one_line_profile: Simple RNA-Seq differential gene expression pipeline using Nextflow
tools.detailed_description: A simple RNA-Seq differential gene expression pipeline implemented using Nextflow.

tools.name: nextNEOpi
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive pipeline for computational neoantigen prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for computational neoantigen prediction implemented in Nextflow.

tools.name: scGEAToolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Matlab toolbox for single-cell gene expression analyses
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab toolbox providing functions for single-cell gene expression analyses.

tools.name: st_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for processing Spatial Transcriptomics data
tools.detailed_description: Tools and scripts needed to process and analyze raw files generated with the Spatial Transcriptomics method in FASTQ format.

tools.name: multiPrime
tools.one_line_profile: Mismatch-tolerant minimal primer set design tool
tools.detailed_description: A mismatch-tolerant minimal primer set design tool for large and diverse sequences (e.g. Virus).

tools.name: dropEst
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for initial analysis of droplet-based single-cell RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for initial analysis of droplet-based single-cell RNA-seq data, including estimation of molecular counts.

tools.name: scrnaseq
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for single-cell RNA-seq analysis using Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A workflow implementation for single-cell RNA-seq analysis using the Seurat package.

tools.name: LncPipe
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow-based pipeline for lncRNA analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow-based pipeline for comprehensive analyses of long non-coding RNAs (lncRNAs) from RNA-seq datasets.

tools.name: cumulus
tools.one_line_profile: Cloud-based scalable single-cell genomics workflows
tools.detailed_description: A suite of cloud-based scalable and efficient single-cell genomics workflows (WDL) for processing large-scale datasets.

tools.name: MAESTRO
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell Transcriptome and Regulome Analysis Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for Single-cell Transcriptome and Regulome Analysis, integrating scRNA-seq and scATAC-seq data.

tools.name: GAGE-seq Workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Data processing and analysis workflow for GAGE-seq (single-cell HiC and RNA-seq co-assay)
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics workflow designed for the processing and analysis of GAGE-seq data, which co-assays single-cell Hi-C and single-cell RNA-seq.

tools.name: bein
tools.one_line_profile: Miniature LIMS and workflow manager for bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) and workflow manager designed specifically for bioinformatics tasks, facilitating data tracking and process management.

tools.name: WAT3R
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for the Association of T-cell receptors from 3' single-cell RNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A workflow designed to associate T-cell receptors (TCR) with 3' single-cell RNA-seq data, enabling the analysis of immune repertoire in single-cell studies.

tools.name: 10X_snakepipe
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for 10X Genomics Cell Ranger
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based pipeline for processing 10X Genomics single-cell data using Cell Ranger, developed by the Max Planck Institute.

tools.name: snakepipes
tools.one_line_profile: Customizable Snakemake workflows for NGS data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of customizable workflows based on Snakemake and Python for the analysis of Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data, including RNA-seq, ChIP-seq, and ATAC-seq.

tools.name: ATLAS
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenome assembly and binning pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for metagenome data analysis, including quality control, assembly, binning, and annotation, designed for ease of use.

tools.name: CromwellOnAzure
tools.one_line_profile: Cromwell workflow engine implementation on Azure
tools.detailed_description: Microsoft Genomics implementation of the Broad Institute's Cromwell workflow engine, optimized for running scientific workflows on the Azure cloud platform.

tools.name: zinbwave-deseq2
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for ZINB-WaVE and DESeq2 integration
tools.detailed_description: A workflow integrating ZINB-WaVE (Zero-Inflated Negative Binomial Wanted Variation Extraction) with DESeq2 for differential expression analysis in single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: ReductionWrappers
tools.one_line_profile: R wrappers for Python dimensional reduction tools
tools.detailed_description: A set of R wrappers to connect Python-based dimensional reduction tools (like UMAP, t-SNE implementations) with R single-cell data objects (Seurat, SingleCellExperiment).

tools.name: grenepipe
tools.one_line_profile: Automated variant calling pipeline for population genomics
tools.detailed_description: A flexible and scalable pipeline for automating variant calling from raw sequence reads, supporting sampled individuals and pool sequencing.

tools.name: Cumulus
tools.one_line_profile: Cloud-based data ingest, archive, and management framework
tools.detailed_description: A cloud-native framework developed by NASA for data ingest, archiving, distribution, and management, primarily used for Earth Science data workflows.

tools.name: PathogenTrack
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to identify pathogenic microorganisms from scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A computational pipeline designed to detect and identify pathogenic microorganisms within single-cell RNA sequencing raw data.

tools.name: MayomicsVC
tools.one_line_profile: Variant Calling Pipeline in Cromwell/WDL
tools.detailed_description: A variant calling pipeline implemented using WDL (Workflow Description Language) and Cromwell, developed by NCSA.

tools.name: Nextflow
tools.one_line_profile: Data-driven computational pipeline engine
tools.detailed_description: A workflow management system and DSL that enables scalable and reproducible scientific workflows using software containers.

tools.name: nf-core/ampliseq
tools.one_line_profile: Amplicon sequencing analysis workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for the analysis of amplicon sequencing data, utilizing DADA2 and QIIME2 for processing and taxonomic classification.

tools.name: nf-core/atacseq
tools.one_line_profile: ATAC-seq analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for ATAC-seq data analysis, including quality control, alignment, peak calling, and differential accessibility analysis.

tools.name: nf-core/bacass
tools.one_line_profile: Bacterial assembly and annotation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for simple bacterial genome assembly and annotation.

tools.name: nf-core/chipseq
tools.one_line_profile: ChIP-seq analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for ChIP-seq data analysis, covering QC, alignment, peak calling, and differential binding analysis.

tools.name: nf-core/cutandrun
tools.one_line_profile: CUT&RUN and CUT&TAG analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for the analysis of CUT&RUN and CUT&TAG experiments, including QC, spike-in normalization, and peak calling.

tools.name: nf-core/differentialabundance
tools.one_line_profile: Differential abundance analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for differential abundance analysis of feature matrices (e.g., from RNA-seq), producing reports and visualizations.

tools.name: nf-core/eager
tools.one_line_profile: Ancient DNA analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A fully reproducible pipeline for ancient DNA (aDNA) analysis, handling specific characteristics of aDNA data such as damage patterns.

tools.name: nf-core/fetchngs
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to fetch metadata and raw FastQ files
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline to retrieve sequencing metadata and raw FastQ files from public databases like SRA, ENA, and DDBJ.

tools.name: nf-core/funcscan
tools.one_line_profile: Functional gene screening pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for screening (meta-)genomes for functional and natural product gene sequences.

tools.name: nf-core/hic
tools.one_line_profile: Hi-C analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for the analysis of Chromosome Conformation Capture (Hi-C) data, including mapping, filtering, and contact map generation.

tools.name: nf-core/mag
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenome assembly and binning pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the assembly, binning, and annotation of metagenomes (MAGs).

tools.name: nf-core/marsseq
tools.one_line_profile: MARS-seq v2 pre-processing pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for the pre-processing of MARS-seq v2 single-cell RNA-seq data, including RNA velocity support.

tools.name: nf-core/mcmicro
tools.one_line_profile: Whole-slide image to single-cell data pipeline
tools.detailed_description: An end-to-end processing pipeline that transforms multi-channel whole-slide images into single-cell data, facilitating spatial omics analysis.

tools.name: nf-core/methylseq
tools.one_line_profile: Methylation (Bisulfite-Sequencing) analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics analysis pipeline for Methylation (Bisulfite-Sequencing) data using Bismark or bwa-meth with MethylDackel, supporting extensive quality control and reporting.

tools.name: nf-core/molkart
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for Molecular Cartography data processing
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for processing Molecular Cartography data from Resolve Bioscience, handling combinatorial FISH data for spatial transcriptomics.

tools.name: nf-core/nanoseq
tools.one_line_profile: Nanopore sequencing analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for analyzing Nanopore sequencing data, performing demultiplexing, quality control, and alignment.

tools.name: nf-core/oncoanalyser
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive cancer DNA/RNA analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive bioinformatics pipeline for cancer DNA and RNA analysis, generating detailed reports for oncology research.

tools.name: nf-core/pangenome
tools.one_line_profile: Pangenome graph construction pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline that renders a collection of genomic sequences into a pangenome graph, facilitating comparative genomics and structural variant analysis.

tools.name: nf-core/pixelator
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Pixelation data analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to generate and process Molecular Pixelation data using Pixelator technology from Pixelgen Technologies AB for spatial proteomics/transcriptomics.

tools.name: nf-core/proteinfold
tools.one_line_profile: Protein 3D structure prediction pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for protein 3D structure prediction, integrating tools like AlphaFold2 and ColabFold for automated structural biology workflows.

tools.name: nf-core/raredisease
tools.one_line_profile: Rare disease variant calling pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline to call and score variants from Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS) or Whole Exome Sequencing (WES) data specifically for rare disease patients.

tools.name: nf-core/rnafusion
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-seq gene fusion detection pipeline
tools.detailed_description: An RNA-seq analysis pipeline dedicated to the detection and visualization of gene fusions using multiple fusion callers.

tools.name: nf-core/rnaseq
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive RNA sequencing analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A standard RNA sequencing analysis pipeline that supports STAR, RSEM, HISAT2, and Salmon, providing gene/isoform counts and extensive quality control.

tools.name: nf-core/sarek
tools.one_line_profile: Germline and somatic variant calling pipeline
tools.detailed_description: An analysis pipeline to detect germline or somatic variants from Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS) or targeted sequencing data, including pre-processing, variant calling, and annotation.

tools.name: nf-core/scdownstream
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell transcriptomics downstream analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for downstream analysis of single-cell transcriptomics data, covering quality control, integration, and visualization.

tools.name: nf-core/scnanoseq
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell Nanopore sequencing pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for analyzing single-cell or single-nuclei data derived from Oxford Nanopore and 10X Genomics protocols.

tools.name: nf-core/scrnaseq
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell RNA-Seq processing pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for processing single-cell RNA-Seq data from barcode-based protocols (e.g., 10x, DropSeq, SmartSeq), offering alignment, quantification, and empty-droplet detection.

tools.name: nf-core/smrnaseq
tools.one_line_profile: Small-RNA sequencing analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for the analysis of small-RNA sequencing data, including miRNA identification and quantification.

tools.name: nf-core/sopa
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial omics pipeline and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow implementation of the Sopa pipeline for processing and analyzing spatial omics data.

tools.name: nf-core/spatialvi
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial transcriptomics pipeline for Visium
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for processing spatially-resolved gene counts with spatial coordinates and image data, specifically designed for 10x Genomics Visium transcriptomics.

tools.name: nf-core/taxprofiler
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-taxonomic profiling pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A highly parallelised pipeline for multi-taxonomic profiling of shotgun short- and long-read metagenomic data.

tools.name: nf-core/viralrecon
tools.one_line_profile: Viral assembly and variant calling pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for assembly and intrahost/low-frequency variant calling for viral samples, widely used for SARS-CoV-2 analysis.

tools.name: DIscBIO
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell biomarker discovery pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly R pipeline for biomarker discovery in single-cell transcriptomics, facilitating data analysis and visualization.

tools.name: distiller-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Modular Hi-C mapping pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A modular Nextflow pipeline for processing Hi-C data, handling mapping, filtering, and matrix generation.

tools.name: kallistobustools
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell RNA-seq pre-processing workflow
tools.detailed_description: A workflow combining kallisto and bustools for fast and efficient pre-processing of single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: kb_python
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for kallisto | bustools workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper for the kallisto | bustools workflow, simplifying the pre-processing of single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: chooseR
tools.one_line_profile: Clustering parameter selection framework for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: An R framework designed to help choose optimal clustering parameters in single-cell RNA-seq analysis pipelines.

tools.name: What_the_Phage
tools.one_line_profile: Phage identification pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A reproducible pipeline for bacteriophage identification and annotation using Nextflow and Docker/Singularity.

tools.name: seurat-wrappers
tools.one_line_profile: Community extensions for Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A collection of community-provided wrappers and extensions for the Seurat package, enabling integration with other single-cell analysis tools.

tools.name: sc-toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Helper functions for Scanpy analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of useful functions and project templates to facilitate single-cell data analysis workflows using Scanpy.

tools.name: zUMIs
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-seq pipeline with UMI handling
tools.detailed_description: A fast and flexible pipeline to process RNA sequencing data, specifically designed to handle Unique Molecular Identifiers (UMIs).

tools.name: sequana
tools.one_line_profile: Set of Snakemake NGS pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Snakemake pipelines for various NGS analysis tasks, including quality control, variant calling, and coverage analysis.

tools.name: single_cell_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Automated single cell analysis workflow
tools.detailed_description: An automated workflow for single-cell analysis, developed by Shah CompBio lab.

tools.name: hecatomb
tools.one_line_profile: Virome analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the analysis of viral metagenomes (viromes) from Illumina sequence data, focusing on sensitivity and accuracy.

tools.name: TMExplorer
tools.one_line_profile: Tumour microenvironment single-cell dataset collection
tools.detailed_description: A curated collection of tumour microenvironment single-cell RNA sequencing datasets provided as an R package for easy access and integration.

tools.name: Snakefiles
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Snakemake workflows for RNA-seq data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing Snakefiles for common RNA-seq data analysis workflows, specifically implementing pipelines for STAR and Kallisto aligners.

tools.name: Cumulus ETL
tools.one_line_profile: ETL tool for processing FHIR medical data for analysis
tools.detailed_description: A tool to extract FHIR data, transform it using NLP and de-identification tools, and load it into a SQL database for downstream scientific and clinical analysis.

tools.name: Snakemake GATK Workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline implementing GATK best-practices for DNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A standardized Snakemake workflow that implements the GATK best-practices for germline variant calling from DNA sequencing data.

tools.name: Snakemake Varlociraptor Workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Unified variant calling workflow using Varlociraptor
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for calling small and structural variants under various scenarios (tumor/normal, pedigree, etc.) using the Varlociraptor statistical model.

tools.name: Snakemake Kallisto-Sleuth Workflow
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-seq differential expression workflow with Kallisto and Sleuth
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed for differential expression analysis of RNA-seq data, utilizing Kallisto for pseudo-alignment and Sleuth for statistical analysis.

tools.name: Snakemake STAR-DESeq2 Workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Standard RNA-seq workflow using STAR and DESeq2
tools.detailed_description: A widely used Snakemake workflow for RNA-seq analysis that performs alignment with STAR and differential expression analysis with DESeq2.

tools.name: Snakemake scRNA-seq Workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for single-cell RNA-seq analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for single-cell RNA-seq data analysis, covering steps from quality control and variable gene analysis to cell type assignment and differential expression.

tools.name: Snakemake
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable bioinformatics workflow management system
tools.detailed_description: A workflow management system that aims to reduce the complexity of creating facsimiles of data analysis to create reproducible and scalable data analyses.

tools.name: Snakemake Wrappers
tools.one_line_profile: Library of reusable wrappers for Snakemake workflows
tools.detailed_description: A repository of wrappers that allow Snakemake rules to directly call various bioinformatics tools and libraries without writing boilerplate shell scripts.

tools.name: St. Jude Cloud Workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatics WDL workflows for St. Jude Cloud
tools.detailed_description: A collection of bioinformatics workflows written in WDL, developed for and used in the St. Jude Cloud project for genomic data analysis.

tools.name: Sunbeam
tools.one_line_profile: Extensible pipeline for metagenomics analysis
tools.detailed_description: A robust and extensible pipeline for metagenomics sequencing data analysis, designed to be easy to install and use while remaining customizable.

tools.name: scIB Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for benchmarking single-cell integration methods
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake pipeline that works with the scIB (Single-cell Integration Benchmark) package to automate the benchmarking of data integration methods.

tools.name: seq2science
tools.one_line_profile: Automated preprocessing workflows for NGS data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of automated and customizable workflows for preprocessing Next-Generation Sequencing data, including ATAC-seq, ChIP-seq, and RNA-seq.

tools.name: VSN Pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipelines for single-cell data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A repository of modular pipelines for single-cell data analysis implemented in Nextflow DSL2, maintained by the VIB Single Cell Core.

tools.name: Nano-Snakemake
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for Nanopore SV analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake pipeline designed for structural variant (SV) analysis from Oxford Nanopore genome sequencing data.

tools.name: Scaff10X
tools.one_line_profile: Genome scaffolding tool using 10x Genomics linked-reads
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline/tool for scaffolding and breaking genome assemblies using 10x Genomics linked-reads data to improve assembly quality.

tools.name: SCP
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-end Single-Cell Pipeline in R
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive R package providing an end-to-end pipeline for single-cell data analysis, facilitating exploration and visualization of scRNA-seq data.
